about_the_game:
Inside History
The events told in Omen Exitio: Hunger start from real events set then within an extremely accurate historical framework, all draped in a typically Lovecraftian atmosphere.

On February 11, 1927, a little boy named Billy Gaffney mysteriously disappears from his apartment in Brooklyn. The town is turned upside down by the authorities and the many volunteers who try to help, but there is no clue about the little boy. Only your intervention could shed some light on this drama.

Through a cinematic and engaging narrative you will have to exploit your skills as a reporter and your keen powers of observation to search for clues and interrogate suspects. But your talents alone will not be enough.
To get closer and closer to the truth you may have to visit other worlds, interpret your dreams, and sometimes listen to your cat. We still don't know what lies beneath that macabre veil that has dropped over the city, Perhaps nothing but horror awaits us.

Be very careful about the choices you decide to make: your actions are limited, and you will have to make crucial decisions. What will you be willing to sacrifice for the discovery of the truth?
Omen Exitio: Hunger is a story of ordinary people discovering how adventure and horror are inherent in the everyday.



With no clues, your investigation cannot continue
Meticulously scour the locations of the investigation: clues will be crucial to closing the case. The New York of Omen Exitio: Hunger is not the famous one of the Roaring Twenties. Cramped, smelly alleys, labyrinthine junkyards, and decaying houses are just a few of the frightening places where you'll have to apply your reporting skills to gather clues vital to the success of your occult investigation.


In princípio erat Verbum
Juggling the truths, lies and lucubrations of suspects and witnesses is certainly not for everyone, but it is your only hope.
New interview-based investigative mechanics will allow you to extract all the information you need to continue your investigation of the unknown.
Sometimes you will find yourself disdaining your interlocutors, others empathizing with them, but what you need to pay most attention to is the shadow behind every word.


The cruelest New York
New York's most famous neighborhoods are the space for adventure. A dark and cold, unforgiving city.
The urban but almost wild environment of these neighborhoods is home to a human fauna of the strangest kind: men and women struggling with their daily lives suddenly interrupted by the inexplicable tragedy you are investigating. You'll have to move through these neighborhoods with your eyes and ears wide open. There are no places that don't deserve your attention, but you won't be able to visit them all either.

content_descriptors.notes:
In general, the adult content in Omen Exitio: Hunger Demo is never excessive or gratuitous. There is no drug abuse, sexual or physical violence. 
Only in one scene is a hangover depicted, which the protagonist gets during an interview with a witness. In any case, the scene is not gratuitous and there is nothing sensitive, disturbing or offensive.

short_description: Forces beyond human comprehension draw a macabre veil over the icy NY of 1927. A child has disappeared and you, a reporter with an unhappy past as an artist, become entangled in the drama. In this story, inspired by true events, you will investigate between reality, dreams and Lovecraftian horrors.
